Info.TextInfo: Drag blocks onto the board to place them.
Place blocks on the grid to make squares to get energy and points.
Here is your energy. It will go up when you make squares and down when you don't. If it hits zero, you lose.
Making squares will earn you points and energy. Try to get a high score!
Extra blocks that are adjacent to squares become Waste. They drain 1 energy from you every move. Get rid of them by using them to make squares!
Waste that is adjacent to squares becomes more potent. Level 2 Waste drains 3 energy each move.
This Waste block has grown out of control! It will drain 5 energy from you each move, so clean it up quick!
You’re running out of energy! Make a square this turn or you’ll lose!
At certain score thresholds Events will be triggered that make the game harder. Each event continues until you earn a certain number of points.
Reactor Breach: A breach has occurred in the reactor and foreign material is taking up space.
Unrefined Uranium: Some budget cuts mean you have to place some less than perfect blocks on the board.
Contamination: Your material has become contaminated and now blocks will spawn with wastes in them.
Reactor Meltdown: The reactor is melting down! Be prepared for multiple events at once!
Reactor Overload: The reactor has completely overloaded! All the events are occurring at once! This is your final challenge!
